gallery.image: Vintage photo of the team celebrating the first league title.
gallery.description: Manchester United celebrates winning its first league title in 1908.

gallery.image: Historic image of the inauguration of Old Trafford.
gallery.description: Old Trafford, the iconic home ground of Manchester United, opens its doors in 1910.

gallery.image: Memorial photo honoring the victims of the Munich Air Disaster.
gallery.description: The Munich Air Disaster in 1958 profoundly impacted Manchester United, claiming the lives of several players and staff.

gallery.image: Historic moment of the team lifting the European Cup.
gallery.description: Manchester United achieves European glory by winning the European Cup for the first time in 1968.

gallery.image: Iconic photo of the team celebrating the historic Treble win.
gallery.description: Manchester United makes history by winning the Premier League, FA Cup, and UEFA Champions League in the unforgettable 1998-1999 season.

gallery.image: Emotional moment of Sir Alex Ferguson bidding farewell.
gallery.description: Sir Alex Ferguson retires after an illustrious managerial career, leaving behind a legacy of success at Manchester United.

gallery.image: Memorable moment of Manchester United lifting the Carabao Cup trophy.
gallery.description: Manchester United secures victory in the Carabao Cup, marking a significant achievement in 2023.

gallery.image: Celebratory moment of Manchester United with the FA Cup trophy.
gallery.description: Manchester United clinches victory in the FA Cup, adding another trophy to their collection in 2024.
